ChatBot.response: Rice is on the left side, 1st row, 2nd column.
Wheat is on the left side, 1st row, 3rd column.
Sugar is on the right side, 2nd row, 1st column.
Salt is on the right side, 2nd row, 2nd column.
Dal is on the left side, 3rd row, 1st column.
Cooking oil is in the middle shelf, 1st row, 4th column.
Milk is in the refrigerated section near the back.
Bread is on the front shelf, 1st row, 1st column.
Butter is in the refrigerated section, 2nd row, 3rd column.
Eggs are in the cold storage unit, 2nd row, 4th column.
Onions are in the vegetable rack, bottom left corner.
Potatoes are in the vegetable rack, bottom right corner.
Tomatoes are in the fresh produce section, 1st crate.
Green chillies are in the vegetable rack, small basket on top.
Turmeric powder is in the spices section, 1st row, 5th column.
Chilli powder is in the spices section, 1st row, 6th column.
Garam masala is in the spices rack, 2nd row, 1st column.
Bath soaps are in the personal care section, right side.
Shampoo bottles are on the right rack, top shelf.
Toothpaste is in the personal care aisle, 2nd shelf.
Tea packs are on the middle aisle, 2nd row, 3rd column.
Coffee is beside the tea section, 2nd row, 4th column.
Biscuits are on the snack shelf, front right corner.
Noodles are in the packed food aisle, 3rd row, 2nd column.
Detergent is on the cleaning supplies rack, bottom shelf.
